content: *berroco yarns for this pattern have been discontinued directions are still available * skill level intermediate materials berroco monet 50 grs 4 balls #3368 wild west a berroco suede 50 grs 3 balls #3765 tobacco b and #3717 wild bill hickock c crochet hook size 5 00 mm h or size to obtain gauge ten 1/4 metal grommets one 10 zipper two 1 diameter metal faceted beads one 10 long piece of heavy waxed cord tapestry needle
